concept.title: Chunk topics (chunk)
concept.shortdesc: The chunk step breaks apart and assembles referenced DITA content based on the @chunk attribute in maps. This step is implemented in Java.

conbody.p:
DITA-OT has implemented processing for the following values of the chunk attribute:
select-topic
select-document
select-branch
by-topic
by-document
to-content
to-navigation
